experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: â€¢ Developed and maintained modules using React Native with Redux for application features, posts listing, modules for liking, sharing, & commenting, with smooth animations with gesture handlersâ€¢ Spearheaded the development of critical component, streamlining integration across multiple modules reducing integration time (75%) and enhanced performance (15%), boosting team efficiencyâ€¢ Maintained and Improvised React Native modules with MobX for efficient state management, resulting in a 30% increase in user interaction across multiple platforms.â€¢ Collaborated with team to optimize performance (70%) and elevate code quality standards, implementing efficient coding practices
experience.description_html: â€¢ Developed and maintained modules using React Native with Redux for application features, posts listing, modules for liking, sharing, & commenting, with smooth animations with gesture handlersâ€¢ Spearheaded the development of critical component, streamlining integration across multiple modules reducing integration time (75%) and enhanced performance (15%), boosting team efficiencyâ€¢ Maintained and Improvised React Native modules with MobX for efficient state management, resulting in a 30% increase in user interaction across multiple platforms.â€¢ Collaborated with team to optimize performance (70%) and elevate code quality standards, implementing efficient coding practices

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: â€¢ Revamped a horizontally scalable and maintainable server using Elastic-beanstalk and CI/CD pipeline    using CircleCI and AWS Code Deploy decreasing deployment & server downtime by 30%â€¢  Developed the cross-platform application using React Native and Redux / Redux Toolkit for central    state management and API Layer.â€¢  Engineered backend with GraphQL, Sequelize, & Cloud servicesâ€¢  Enhanced website performance by 100% through strategic implementation of Dynamic Import for    efficient resource loading, Next/Image , and Pagination to streamline content navigation.â€¢  Built FE & BE for the internal CRM Portal, building services like order, product and user management,     customer support, sales dashboard, and engagement notification with RBAC for operations.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Revamped a horizontally scalable and maintainable server using Elastic-beanstalk and CI/CD pipeline  using CircleCI and AWS Code Deploy decreasing deployment & server downtime by 30%â€¢ Developed the cross-platform application using React Native and Redux / Redux Toolkit for central  state management and API Layer.â€¢ Engineered backend with GraphQL, Sequelize, & Cloud servicesâ€¢ Enhanced website performance by 100% through strategic implementation of Dynamic Import for  efficient resource loading, Next/Image , and Pagination to streamline content navigation.â€¢ Built FE & BE for the internal CRM Portal, building services like order, product and user management,  customer support, sales dashboard, and engagement notification with RBAC for operations.

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Part of the 23 Member Core Team of the symposium which is responsible for Publicity and Sponsorshipâ€¢Solely garnered INR 2.25 lakhs worth net corporate sponsorship and alumni contribution from regions of Mumbaiâ€¢Approached Messaging Companies and Media Platforms to have them as Messaging and Online Media Partnersâ€¢Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates &12 Campus Ambassadors responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020â€¢As Web Sub-coordinator managed Kshitij's official website and ensured the update about the fest
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
Part of the 23 Member Core Team of the symposium which is responsible for Publicity and Sponsorship
â€¢Solely garnered INR 2.25 lakhs worth net corporate sponsorship and alumni contribution from regions of Mumbai
â€¢Approached Messaging Companies and Media Platforms to have them as Messaging and Online Media Partners
â€¢Led a team of 42 Campus Affiliates &12 Campus Ambassadors responsible for the publicity of Kshitij 2020
â€¢As Web Sub-coordinator managed Kshitij's official website and ensured the update about the fest

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: â€¢ Worked with a team of 33 members for the publicity and for the execution of 33 events, 13 workshops, 4 exhibitions, 6 guest lectures, and mega showsâ€¢ Publicized the symposium across colleges of Kolkata & Nagpur and published 3 media articles in newspapers in Maharashtraâ€¢ Assisted the members in the Guest Reception team and successfully accommodated all the guests of Kshitij at IIT Kharagpur during 3 days of the fest
